statements: DELETE FROM risk_parameters WHERE strategy_name = 'High Risk' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM risk_parameters WHERE strategy_name = 'New Strategy' AND risk_limit = 0.5;
DELETE FROM execution_limits WHERE max_orders_per_sec > 10 AND time_window = '1 hour';
DELETE FROM execution_limits WHERE time_window > '1 day';
DELETE FROM ExecutionStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Sample Strategy';
DELETE FROM RiskParameters WHERE risk_limit > 0.5 AND risk_threshold < 0.2;
DELETE FROM StrategyMetrics WHERE strategy_id = 10 AND metric_name = 'Sharpe Ratio';
